name: Just Fooling Around Online Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Complete the phrase: 'Give me liberty or give me ...'
Hamlet said: 'Alas, poor Yorick. I knew him, Horatio'. What had happened to Yorick?
options: He was doing a stretch in prison
He was going through his fifth divorce

questions.text: 'I am not a crook' was a statement made by President Nixon after he ...
options: was accused of being a pickpocket
was picked up for shoplifting in a department store

questions.text: 'I only regret that I have but one ___ to give for my country.'
'I shall return' was spoken by General MacArthur after he departed from where?
options: His first date with his new girl friend
questions.explanation:
The Philippines.

	It is believed he was referring to his forced withdrawal from the Philippines under pressure from the invading Japanese. The Philippines had been his virtual home for several decades before and into World War II.

questions.text: 'I came, I saw, I conquered' was spoken by Julius Caesar after he did what?
options: Hit a trifecta at the track
Made a killing in the stock market

questions.text: Lincoln observed that the great task of the nation was to ensure that 'government of the people, by the people and for the people...'
questions.correct: Shall not perish from the earth
options: Shall be done away with by Big Business
Shall be filled with corrupt bureaucrats
questions.explanation: Shall not perish from the earth.

questions.text: The Declaration of Independence provides that people shall enjoy 'life, liberty and the pursuit of ___ .'
The saying 'tell it like it is' was popularized by whom?
Finish the lyric: 'Hey, Jude, don't be afraid, take a sad song and ___ .'
options: Sell the rights to Michael Jackson
